website_summaries.verdict: A vast variety of toys at a low price point, perfect for large parties.
pros: 120 piece set includes a wide variety of toys, accessories, and noisemakers
An even number of each item ensures each kid gets the same party favors
Large set sits at a low price point
cons: The clapper toys break quite easily

customer_reviews.title: Nice giveaways
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prize pack for giveaways to elementary aged children. They loved the little toys included. The number and quantity of prizes allowed for prizes to be given out at a variety of events. My only complaint is that there are a lot of whistles - children love them but they are quite annoying. This product has 5 stars because the kids loved them and there is quite a selection for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse NietzerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I would just go to the dollar store for my party favors but decided I would probably end up spending more for everything versus buying this box. I’m pleasantly surprised by the variety of trinkets for both boys and girls but I’m more pleasantly surprised by the quality. It feels sturdier than dollar store party favors and will hold up longer. The only downside is that there isn’t equal amounts of everything so not every kid is going to get the same toys. I’m still very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this box.
customer_reviews.author: DKN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goodie bag items!
customer_reviews.text: There are a LOT of items in here and we were able to easily cover about 15 goodie bags with these (will easily make 20). Pretty much everything worked without failure and the molding is quite good for such a cheaply priced package. Best yet, I didn't have to go around shopping for items. To the vendor -- thank you for putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: vc

customer_reviews.title: Very cool...
customer_reviews.text: ..great collection of toys. They are cute and actually do funny little tricks such as the cars pull back and go and there are hopping little bugs. For a toy grab back assortment this one is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: greengirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome variety, good price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's preschool end of the year party. The box they came in was really nice, it wasn't some basic box. Loved the variety and our favorite toy was the jumping suction cup spider, mainly bc out of the 120 pcs my daughter only got one, maybe the teachers really liked them too hahaha. Will definitely order again for birthday party favors, pinata stuffer or school event!
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Bad for Piñata Stuffing - Good for Party Bags for birthdays
customer_reviews.text: The toy selection that was included was good...The "Paddles with the string" attached... I highly recommend not including those. Every kid hit someone in the face with that string and they didn't know what do with the toy (ages 4-8)... I bought this party pack for Piñata stuffing. When the Piñata was opened, the toys came crashing down onto the floor, and mostly broke into pieces since they were all plastic, and we were on a hardwood floors. The kids were sad. Some of the toys that were included were WAY to big to fit inside the Piñata...If you are buying this for party favor bags, then you will be happy. I bought this party pack for Piñata stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Foodiechats

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the assortment for the price, I gave it a 2 for sturdiness, because I would definitely not call these toys sturdy. Our girls destroy stuff easy. And these will be ruined in minutes. So these will work well for the purpose of getting a prize at the end of the week for being good, and I’m sure they won’t last long. Hiding the whistles though 😂
customer_reviews.author: Rivest

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small carnival prizes not with the money
customer_reviews.text: Alot smaller than I thought they would be. A little cheap actually, a few things are nice like the pull back motorized cars. But the tiny frisby's are really dumb and some thing that shoots a tiny ball which is smaller than a marble. Wanted to have a little carnival with my 6 grandchildren. Many things in this box are definitely choke hazards so make sure they don't go to any households with young children under 5. Amazon didn't have carnival prizes that were bigger. Would not purchase these again, nor would I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as ecpected.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality and size of this product. If you want these prizes for 3-4 year olds, they are good. Older children would not want them. The flappers do not work and are held together with a flimsy rubber band. The maracas are tiny, about 3 inches long. This prize box was priced the best, but I would not buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Ljch

customer_reviews.title: Good variety for prize box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with school-age children in a clinical setting. Most pieces are holding up and the kids like new things so the variety influenced my decision. The glasses are a little disappointing: too small for the kids' faces and one broke when we attempted to open (normal process not extreme pulling). But overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack for an assortment of prizes. A wide selection is included and I was happy with the prizes included. I think that kids, especially younger kids, will really enjoy these prizes. They are packaged tightly in a small box, so they save on space. The box opens up nicely and can be used to display the prizes directly from the box, which is a huge plus to me. Vote helpful if this review helped you!
customer_reviews.author: C&H

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best piñata stuffer I have ever gotten! And this is my third. Definitely saving it under my favorites to re-buy for next year! My son didn’t even want to put the toys inside! They look great! 3+!!!! If you are doing it for younger children please make sure you tell the parents to watch for small pieces! All the balls and small toys are a chocking hazard! So PLEASE!!!!! make sure you purchase this knowing that the items are small.
customer_reviews.author: carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good party favors.
customer_reviews.text: These were party favors for a birthday party and everyone liked them. They aren’t great quality but, they likely end up in the garbage anyway. You get a lot of pieces for the price. I was missing some pieces and the Chinese finger traps were all breaking apart easily or not keeping the fingers trapped at all but, I contacted the company and they quickly got me the missing items and they were very nice. I would order again but I would want a different selection of toys.
customer_reviews.author: WooGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys for birthday gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these little toys for birthday party gift bags for 3 and 4 year olds. The kids LOVED them. Even the older siblings wanted to play with them. I would definitely buy them again but since they are plastic, a rough child can break them but that did not happen at our birthday party. But the kids do have to be watched which is reasonable. They are colorful and I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Best mixed toy pack I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed with this box of toys. (I’ve bought a lot of party toys in the past and been disappointed.) The toys actually came in a box, not just a reused plastic bag. There was a good mix of items that interested my 6 and 8 year old. Well worth the money for what I paid. Was able to make over 20 gift bags for my kids bday party. Would order again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 6th birthday party favors
customer_reviews.text: These were incredible, they came all mixed up in a box, I sorted them and divvied them out to small cellophane party favor bags for a 6th birthday party. The kids were so excited, and since there was such a selection, all bags were unique... the kids loved seeing what everyone got in their bag. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow KP

customer_reviews.title: Box of Little Treasures
customer_reviews.text: Likes: All the toys comes in different colors and there's a great variety. Ovrall, gender neutral toys and colors which is great because I have both boys and girls. We use this to fill up our reward treasure box and this is awesome because it looks like it's going to last us a while!! Yay me!! I'm going to buy another soon. Nothing but smiling faces after opening this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Okay for gift bags but had to buy two to make things even for small children.
customer_reviews.text: Just remember you get what you pay for. These are perfect for party favor bags but in order to give 10 children equal items I had to buy two so there would be no fighting. Would be nice to chose a package for the number of children attending. Made it a little expensive for gift bags. Two of the heart Spirographs didn’t have the gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Schaf

customer_reviews.title: Behavioral incentive treats
customer_reviews.text: We use these as incentive treats in my wife's Transitional Kindergarten Class, when a students behavior is exceptionally good for a day they get to pick a treat out of the treasure chest. They are always excited at a new variety to chose from!
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these toys to fill our prize box. They are just like the toys kids get at arcades and play spaces. Love them! The colors are bright and the variety is great. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT value for the price, there are a variety of toys that are useful and kids from 2-7 loved them, even my 40 year old husband. I used this in addition to seperately purchased candy and sonic facemasks for a party of 12 kids and the kids spent 40 minutes excited about the toys, and I even had some to spare. Again an amazing value for the price, I would have spent well over 100 dollars for all of these at party city without even being as awesome. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: nursetey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as prizes for my daughter who is potty training. There is a good variety of items. Some are too hard for her to do (she is 2) like the ball shooter and the little disk shooter things. But she loves all of the things in here! My 5 year old also loves to get one so it’s also good for his age.
customer_reviews.author: ashtyn828

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was AMAZING! I got 15 goody bags for my daughters bday party. She had friends and cousins from newborn to age 6 boys and girls at her party and there was something for everyone (we put the glasses on the newborn). Everyone got something they loved.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with five year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to fill a “just because” piñata to break up quarantine for My five yr old. He has been playing w these non stop. They’re simple and cheap but don’t easily break (except sunglasses-The hinges aren’t secure). Good value and would be a great prize pack for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: We got 99% of our order
customer_reviews.text: We got what we paid for. Cute toys but we got 119 out of 120, so we were short by 1 toy. We made 30 goodie bags for kids with each kid receiving 4 each. We had to scramble to find 1 more to be fair for the kids. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Emery

customer_reviews.title: Treasure Box Toys
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my classroom treasure box. The 2nd graders love them and it is great to have a "non candy" alternative to motivate the children.
customer_reviews.author: tchrnemo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap party favors. Very few of them will hold anyone's interest too ling. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent prices! Worked great for piñata!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend!! We used this for a pinata. It worked perfect and the toys were a hit with all the kids. The party was for a 4 year old and there were kids 4-7 there and all loved them! No issues, nothing broken when the toys “fell” out of the piñata .. excellent seller! Recommend for your next party to fill Goody bags, piñatas or just rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great for classes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Sunday School classes (4-5 graders). I thought that maybe some of them would think the toys were a bit a lame but when given the choice between sweets and a toy - most when for the toy. Great rewards
customer_reviews.author: AViteri

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: I know this may seem a bit strange but I didn't buy this for my kids. I bought this items as toys for my African Grey. He loved the toys and would even fly over to the box to get into the toys. My children ages 11 - 16 also wanted to get into the toys and play with them as well. Very happy with my purchase and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Okay for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I work at an elementary school and I bought this set to use as prizes or rewards for students. I liked that there are a variety of items to pick from. However, a lot of the pieces broke right away and some of the whistles and noise makers didn't make any noise. Overall, I'd say this set isn't the best bang for your buck. I'd spend a little more to get better quality things that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as favors for my son's 5th birthday party. Everything was exactly how it was described. I made 20 plus bags. Each bag had at least 5 items and I added candy to fill. This is totally worth the money. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I recommend this for any kids party. I will defiantly order again.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Skeete

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This prize package is awesome! It has a great selection of toys and prizes. Everything is of good quality. We opened the box and started playing with everything right away. We really went back in time with the Chinese finger traps. It is totally worth the price. A great variety of toys like whistles, slinkys, sun glasses, magic wands, finger traps, disc throwers, ball shooters (really fun), pop up toys, maracas, etc. So FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Redchow

customer_reviews.title: Great prizes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome prizes! It comes in a good box to that I plan on keeping & using. There's is alot of prizes & different kinds. I like to use prizes instead of candy for easter. So these won't fit in Easter eggs but my kids are going to bring me their eggs & exchange them for prizes this yr. I know my kids will really like these. Good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good party favors
customer_reviews.text: Used in party favors bags at a birthday party. There wasn't 5 of everything as it shows. Some things had 3 while others had 6. Very cute box but very be warned that you need to open it on a flat surface! They WILL fall out. It would be better if the toys were bagged by fives, it would by easier in many ways. I guess what matters is that the kids loved them once they traded each other what they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria a

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought the prizes for our son's third birthday party as goody bag gifts. They were a lot of fun and all of the kids seemed to enjoy playing with them. There was a nice variety in the box, and they were of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: The best goodies bags I’ve ever made thanks to these.
customer_reviews.text: Planning my son’s 1st birthday was great, I ordered this packet of party supplies and it literally was so much better than I expected. The kids helped me put together the goodie bags and even though they are kids, they said these were great quality. Lol we had 24 bags and we easily put about 4-6 toys in each bag along with candy. Everyone loved the toys. So convenient to have it all in one box. I’ve thrown several birthday parties in my 9 years of parenting, but this made making goodie bags an absolute breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Phoenix Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 of the box is unknown.
customer_reviews.text: This came in a nice looking box. But I’d say a good 1/3 is useless and not even sure what it’s purpose is. I was hoping to skip the dollar store for my daughters party favors. I might have to make that dreaded trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great, exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for carnival prizes, they were a huge hit with the kids. Be aware that some of the toys are a little smaller than you'd expect, but overall I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amberhhhh

customer_reviews.title: The kids liked them except the glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a piñata. The kids liked them except the glasses. The glasses easily broke. I understand that being in a piñata, it's expected, but not all! The rest was great. The kids left with tons of goodies in their bags! I would purchase again, but I would leave the glasses out and just use them as something in their gift bags before the piñata.
customer_reviews.author: The Payne's

customer_reviews.title: WILL BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: We ADORED these items! This combo prize box was the absolute perfect addition to my sons golden birthday. We made 12 goodie bags for his guests and they had an absolute blast opening them. The squeals of delight were surround sound. This will be a repeat purchase and the variety and quality are 10/10!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Alot for a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect for the purpose of my party goers. Everyone thought that they were bright and colorful. Also there was an array of items to choose from. Plus the price was awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheria Jones-Winston

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag of Goodies
customer_reviews.text: The bag of random toys was pretty great. None of them were broken and they had such a nice variety. It was like 6 of each item. I absolutely love the packaging they came in too. The products are brand new and I know the kids will have an awesome time with their goody bags at the birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quantity over quality
customer_reviews.text: The toys were smaller than I thought they would be. They’re basically little toys we paid a quarter to get out of a machine. About 3 of them were broken. This is good if you’re looking to fill up favor bags. Not so good if you’re looking for quality items. I doubt that kids would get much out of the toys. You basically get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of toys
customer_reviews.text: I liked the box the toys came in. I didn't like that the toys were not bagged. The toys were loose inside the box. Nice selection for both girls and boys. I purchased these for school treasure box treats.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as gifts for party favors and the kids loved it. The ages were from 3-14 so definitely someone in the box for everyone. I will purchase more for my students
customer_reviews.author: Jaren Greene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I received
customer_reviews.text: Great price and better quality than most trinkets. Perfect for birthday parties or giveaways comes in a cool box. Son wants it all for himself :b
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Too small...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for prizes for 2-5 year olds, and over half of these prizes are way too small for the 2 and 3 year olds. Very disappointing, since it is supposed to be for ages 3 on up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Great for goody bags and piñatas
customer_reviews.text: Loved, loved the party pack. The box it cane in was really nice as well. There was a wide variety of pieces in there. all the kids loved the prizes specially the glasses. Really good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yankeebrat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. There was one toy inside that had broken when I first got the box, one of the little archer ball shooters, and another of the ball shooters just needed a little adjustment in order to shoot. All in all a great box of goodies for kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Corkran

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price— not for older kids, good variety
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a reward system for good behavior. I have two sons -one 10 and 6. I do think it is worth the price to use in party gift favor bags. If you are looking for prize box for 4-5 year old - this would also be an excellent choice.but for my oldest they don’t cut the muster so to speak. Excellent service with delivery and fair price. Much cheaper than the over priced cheap toys at Party City.
customer_reviews.author: JB424

customer_reviews.title: Good mix for school treasure chest.
customer_reviews.text: My students like getting these as a Friday reward in our classroom treasure chest. They loved the unicorn bracelets although a bit large for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a bday favo. Kids had fun with it at the party and kept them occupied. I gave each and everyone random things..they kept comparing to each other..some made trades. It was totally worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality - be cautious with little ones
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this is really poor. A lot of them were broken or fallen apart even before they were used. Be cautious around kids and check the items first.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA BYRD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great selection and perfect amount! We got this for my son’s carnival birthday party and it was perfect! We had kids of various ages and everyone was able to find things they were (enthusiastically) happy with!
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: TREASURE CHEST OF GOODIES.
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR MY "TREASURE BOX" IN A SMALL MEDICAL OFFICE. Some of the pieces are quite small and a very young child can put them in their mouth. So I have to supervise them as they get something out...but that's it. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This was amazing!! You get sooo much product and variety for the money, and these make perfect gift bags for kids for any occasion. Will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Marie Postlethwait

customer_reviews.title: Fun Items!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to include as party bag items for my daighter’s birthday party. I’m probably having more fun playing with these than they are! The plastic pan whistle is the absolute favorite of the kids (so my apologies to the parents that have to listen to the incessant high pitched whistles). Great item. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Working Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap. I understand the toys are plastic however more than half of toys fell apart when I opened the box. I will never order from this seller again. The toys were cheaply put together and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favors or Prizes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for our church carnival and was very happy. It was truthfully advertised, and packaged nicely. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TeachingDiva

customer_reviews.title: perfect goodie bag fillers
customer_reviews.text: these toys filled the goodie bags for my granddaughters first birthday! (the kids in attendance were alot older than one!) i heard a couple kids say it was just like christmas!! HUGE hit with the kids!!
customer_reviews.author: jody girl

customer_reviews.title: Very cool variety
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Including a lot of different things perfect for my daughters party bags. Also the box it came in was very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: This great
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this package, the toys the variety, i want another one i love it. Thanks i cant wait for the birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them. Parents ehh
customer_reviews.text: Cheap toys for treasure box for my children’s teacher. I actually dislike when my kids come home with them. They’re cheap and annoying, which means kids love them. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten R

customer_reviews.title: Fun and funny
customer_reviews.text: Fun and funny! I removed all the possible missile/projectile 2-part shooting toys (...why include these? "I lost it!" "He shot me in the eye!" "I shot him in the butt and now he won't give it back to me!" shall I go on?) from the party-favor box, but as these constituted only a small part of the purchase I still think the thing as a whole is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my children some pieces are a bit small but my kids are old enough to not put it in there mouths we use these in a prize box and if they earn 20-30 stars a week off there chore chart than they earn a prize out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for party bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great for party favor bags for kids. I’ve ordered two boxes for my daughters parties, and gave the left overs to a speech therapist I know, to hand out for prizes. It was like Christmas for her! I’d definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This box seems fantastic. I bought it for my daughter 7th birthday and she approved off all the gadgets and goodies. I bought some tattoos to add to it and recycled all the whistles instead of having every other parent and myself hate this decision for 2 hours. Her party is in a few days but I'm sure this will be a hit. Loved the cpnvenience and price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CHILDREN PARTIES!
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THAT THE KIDS HAD FUN WITH ALL THE DIFFERENT TOYS. A GREAT PARTY BAG FILLER. LOW COST FOR WHAT YOU GET.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: All of these toys are great and are better quality than similarly priced favors from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Kindergarten class, where we have a daily raffle. All of these toys are great and are better quality than similarly priced favors from the dollar store. I wish I had thought to search for prize packs on Amazon years ago!
customer_reviews.author: JennS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Nieces birthday goody bags and my daughters Pinata. Would work great for a treasure chest as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pear

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is having a carnival theme birthday later in the month. I was looking for ways to have prize table and not break the bank. Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: jennifer denson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for birthday celebrations
customer_reviews.text: It came in a beautiful box...well packed. I used for my daughter birthday and all the kid’s loved it. For the money you received a lot well done little toys. For sure I will buy it again for futures celebrations.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This completely exceeded my expectations!! The toys are so fun and good quality for the price! The variety of favors is nice too, so you can mix and match. Bought this to give out to trick or treaters and will definitely be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: GKW

customer_reviews.title: Really small items
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought treasure box items before that looked similar to this item, but these were all really really tiny. Very misleading or maybe I should have checked the description better.
customer_reviews.author: KrsMill

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trinkets
customer_reviews.text: These little trinkets are great and seem to be decent quality. I use them in my treasure box in my classroom and the items are very popular with my Kindergarten-4th graders.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A nice variety of "prizes"! I purchased this for my grandsons crane machine and am very happy with this box of toys. Recieved everything advertised packed in a nice box and the quality seems good so far... I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice touch for my nieces birthday party! ALl the kids had fun playing with these little toys. A lot of toys for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it especially for piñatas
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my nephew b-day party . I filled the piñata with this along with candy . Kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Shay Baez

customer_reviews.title: fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: we reserved a table for the kids in the party hall and kept this box. the kids were having fun time.. its a great thing to have for any event, if you are inviting more kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came with a cute package. There’s tons of stuff in the box which is perfect for a birthday party (my use) or as a prize for good behavior
customer_reviews.author: jlms

customer_reviews.title: Read Here!
customer_reviews.text: Three of my children have birthdays this month. We have been shopping around to give them an awesome combined birthday party, but without breaking our wallets. These Party Favors reallty DO IT. There are Stunna Shades, Slinkies, Hand Slappies, Whistles, And Even More! Get It If You Want Something Awesome For Your Piñata Or Goodie Bags!

customer_reviews.title: A box of fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun stuff suitable for boys and girls. My only let down were the “ hand-clappers” they were very flimsy and didn’t really clap, in fact 1 was broke and another was missing the additional hands. But it’s ok cause the disc shooters made up for it, they were very cool and even this “ oldster” had fun playing with it. Good for ages 4-12

Box it came in is sturdy and nice while it waits for our event.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of toys!

I knew that there were going to be a lot, but didn't realize how big of a variety that there was going to be. I will be able to load the bags up and either put away the rest for next year or pass them along to her school for their prize box.
